mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER (id, password, user_name, nick_name, email, phone_number, profile_image_url, is_email_auth, is_in_active) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{userName}, #{nickName}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{profileImageUrl}, #{isEmailAuth}, #{isInActive})
